wikitext.*:
{{year-header}}
==January==
* '''[[3 January|3]]''' - [[Birthday Toast#Tolkien Society tradition|Birthday Toast]].
* '''[[10 January|10]] - [[11 January|11]]''' - [[Mythmoot]] III.
* '''[[15 January|15]]''' - ''[[A Brief History of The Hobbit]]'' is  published.
* '''[[16 January|16]]''' - ''[[Perilous and Fair]]'' is published.
* '''?''' - ''[[Amon Hen 251]]'' is published.

==February==
* '''[[14 February|14]]''' - Actor [[Alan Howard]] dies.
* '''[[26 February|26]]''' - ''[[Smith of Wootton Major]]'' pocket edition is published.
* '''[[27 February|27]]''' - Actor and singer [[Leonard Nimoy]] dies.

==March==
* '''[[5 March|5]]''' - Artist and linguist [[Tom Loback]] dies.
* '''[[12 March|12]]''' - [[Terry Pratchett]] dies.
* '''[[24 March|24]]''' - ''[[The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armies]]'' is released for digital download.
* '''[[24 March|24]]''' - ''[[The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armies]]'' is released on Blu-ray and DVD in the USA.
* '''[[25 March|25]]''' - [[Tolkien Reading Day]].
* '''?''' - ''[[Amon Hen 252]]'' is published.

==April==
* '''[[20 April|20]]''' - Voice actor [[Peter Howell]] dies.
* '''[[20 April|20]]''' - ''[[The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armies]]'' is released on Blu-ray and DVD in the UK.
* '''[[27 April|27]]''' - Cinematographer [[Andrew Lesnie]] dies.

==May==
* '''[[15 May|15]]''' - Voice actor [[John Stephenson]] dies.
* '''[[21 May|21]]''' - ''[[Beowulf: A Translation and Commentary]]'' by [[J.R.R. Tolkien]], edited by [[Christopher Tolkien]], is published in paperback.
* '''?''' - ''[[Amon Hen 253]]'' is published.

==June==
* '''[[7 June|7]]'''  - Actor [[Christopher Lee]] dies.
* '''[[12 June|12]]''' - [[Parma Eldalamberon 22|''Parma Eldalamberon'' 22]] is published.

==July==
* '''[[4 July|4]]''' - [[The Tolkien Society]] Seminar at the Hilton, [[Leeds]].
* '''[[7 July|7]]''' - ''[[Representations of Nature in Middle-earth]]'' is published.
* '''[[21 July|21]]''' – Actor [[Theodore Bikel]] dies.
* '''[[30 July|30]]''' - ''[[Tolkien Calendar 2016]]'' is published.
* '''[[31 July|31]] - [[3 August|3 Aug.]]''' - [[Mythcon 46]] in Hotel Elegante, [[wikipedia:Colorado Springs, Colorado|Colorado Springs]].
* '''?''' - ''[[Amon Hen 254]]'' is published.

==August==
* '''[[3 August|3]]''' - [[Jef Murray]] dies.
* '''[[6 August|6]]-[[9 August|9]]''' - [[Omentielva|Omentielva Enquea]] - Sixth International Conference on [[J.R.R. Tolkien|Tolkien]]'s Invented Languages in [[Greisinger Museum]], Switzerland.
* '''[[11 August|11]]''' - Actor [[Richard Whiteside]] dies.
* '''[[27 August|27]]''' - '''''[[The Story of Kullervo]]''''' is published in the UK.
* '''[[31 August|31]]''' - ''[[Journeys & Destinations]]'' is published.

==September==
* '''[[5 September|5]]-[[6 September|6]]''' - [[Middle-earth Festival]] at [[Sarehole Mill]], [[Birmingham]].
* '''[[10 September|10]]-[[13 September|13]]''' - [[Oxonmoot 2015]] at [http://www.sant.ox.ac.uk St Antony's College], [[University of Oxford|Oxford]].
* '''[[21 September|21]]'''  - [[Arne Zettersten]], colleague and friend of [[J.R.R. Tolkien]], dies.
* '''?''' - ''[[Amon Hen 255]]'' is published.

==October==
* '''[[6 October|6]]''' - [[Árpád Göncz]] dies.
* '''[[8 October|8]]''' - ''[[The Art of The Lord of the Rings]]'' is published in the UK.
* '''[[13 October|13]]''' - ''[[The Art of The Lord of the Rings]]'' is published in the US.
* '''[[20 October|20]]''' - ''[[The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armies]]'' [[The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armies (extended edition)|Extended Edition]] is released for digital download.

==November==
* '''[[5 November|5]]''' - ''[[The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armies: Chronicles: The Art of War]]'' is published.
* '''[[17 November|17]]''' - ''[[The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armies]]'' [[The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armies (extended edition)|Extended Edition]] is released on Blu-ray and DVD in Canada and the USA.
* '''[[18 November|18]]''' - ''[[The Tolkien Treasury]]'' is published.
* '''[[23 November|23]]''' - ''[[The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armies]]'' [[The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armies (extended edition)|Extended Edition]] is released on Blu-ray and DVD in the UK.
* '''?''' - ''[[Fan Phenomena: The Lord of the Rings]]'' is published.
* '''?''' - ''[[Amon Hen 256]]'' is published.
* '''?''' - ''[[Mallorn 56]]'' is published.

==December==
* '''[[13 December|13]]''' - Author [[Daniel Grotta]] dies.
